alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Coffee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 4:33PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Coffee and northeastern Atkinson Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 433 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Douglas, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Douglas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
